title: ulaga vAzhvil
sahitya:
ulaga vAzhvil oru magizhvuNDO inda uNmaiyai nI marandaden koNDO inda 


anupallavi

  kalaga kAma tAmasa guNa iruL shEr kADu pOlum ahankArap-puliyulavum inda 


caraNam    kaDalil alai pOlum OyAt-tuyaram kavalaiyum nOyum kanal pOl kAyum
uDal manaivi makkaLil AshAAsham oru kaNam shAntamilA nAgavAsam
